= Haskell =

== Quicksort in Haskell... ==
{{{
quicksort' :: (Ord a) => [a] -> [a]
quicksort' [] = []
quicksort' (x:xs) =
    let bigger = quicksort' [a | a <- xs, a > x]
        smaller = quicksort' [a | a <- xs, a <= x]
    in  bigger ++ [x] ++ smaller
}}}
I had these three words to say when I saw the above: OH. MY. GOD.

== Fibonacci ==
{{{
fibs = 0 : 1 : zipWith (+) fibs (tail fibs)
}}}
How elegant is that. [http://en.literateprograms.org/Fibonacci_numbers_(Haskell) Source].
